snippet.title: Ninja Hop Trailer Video
snippet.description:
Dynamic action platformer with a set of levels. You play for the ninjia whose purpose to reach top and to get out of a vertical labyrinth.
Support us on http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=862877727
